content: this beautiful cypress infinity cowl is perfect for fall or winter it is made with red heart soft yarn so it is super soft and cozy this pattern is one of the january contributions to the 2020 scarf and hat of the month club > this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 376 yds of category 4 medium weight yarn i used red heart soft in the dark leaf colorway * size i 5 5 mm crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
